nodes.text: The Neuvia system was a star system located within the Colonies region of the galaxy.
The Neuvian sundae was from this system.
The Neuvia system was explored sometime between 27,500 BBY and 25,000 BBY during the Pre-Hyperdrive, Tionese/Hutt holdings, and Birth of the Galactic Republic.
By 25 ABY, the Neuvia system boasted a population of 10 billion to 100 billion sentients.
